message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe could greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this unique product to you for $1,250,000. We believe this price reflects the value and quality of the product while providing you with a competitive advantage in your field. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your business operations.
Alice, your product looks great, but I'm not able to meet your asking price. I'm happy to pay $1,000,000 for it.  This is my final offer.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we would like to counter your offer with a proposal of $1,100,000 for the product. We understand your budget constraints, and we believe this price offers a fair compromise between the value of the product and your financial considerations. We hope this revised offer will be more suitable for your needs.
